ui.error.numpad0_progress: Press control + numpad-0 {remaining} more {#remaining|time|times} to access
ui.error.must_be_host_to_use_seats: Only the host can use the !seats command
ui.help.alt_zoom_ground: Alt-zoom faction sheets, etc: settings > game > advanced 'Ground Object Interaction'
ui.message.not_enough_command_tokens: {playerColor} does not have enough command tokens in supply.

ui.message.trade_agreement_has_no_owner: Trade Agreement has no owner, can't cash it in.
ui.message.trade_agreement_has_no_factio: Trade Agreement owner has no faction, can't cash it in.
ui.message.helio_command_array: {playerName} using Helio Command Array to remove each of their command tokens from the game board.
ui.message.helio_command_array_has_no_ow: No faction has Jace X. 4th Air Legion as a hero, cannot perform Helio Command Array.
ui.message.multiverse_shift: {playerName} using Multiverse Shift to place and explore frontier tokens.
ui.message.multiverse_shift_has_no_owner: No faction has Conservator Procyon as a her, cannot Multiverse Shift.
ui.message.dimensional_anchor: {playerName} using Dimensional Anchor to capture ships.
ui.message.dimensional_anchor_has_no_own: No faction has It Feeds on Carrion as a hero, cannot perform Dimensional Anchor.
ui.message.roll.dimensional_anchor: {playerName} rolling for Dimensional Anchor! ships with red lines are captured; results are logged in chat
ui.message.political_stability: {playerName} used Political Stability to hold onto {strategyCard}
ui.error.too_many_opponents: Too many players in fight, unable to assign opponent
ui.error.missing_command_token_bag: {name} does not have a command token bag
ui.error.diplomacy_no_token: {name} does not have a command token in reinforcements
ui.error.strategy_no_token: {name} does not have a strategy token
ui.tooltip.strategy_card_play: Play this strategy card for your turn
ui.button.your_turn_end_turn: YOUR TURN {current}, CLICK TO END TURN
ui.action.system.auto_rift_roll: Grav Rift all ships in system
ui.message.system_enable_right_click:
Enable the setting:
> Escape 
> Settings 
> Game 
> Show advanced interface settings 
> Ground Object Interaction / Zoom and open context menu
(Some dynamic items like Plague and Naz-Rokha mech explore are only in the pop-up menu)
ui.label.speaker: Speaker
ui.strategy.instructions: Player uses their Strategy Card. Click the button on the back of the card.
ui.component.instructions: Player uses the component action of a cards or ability. Follow the instructions on that component.
ui.menu.fetch_custodia_vigilia: Fetch Custodia Vigilia planet card and legendary card
ui.menu.trade_agreement: Return trade agreement and gain commodities
ui.tooltip.mageon_implants: The player clicking this tells the player with the card in their area their action cards
ui.tooltip.yssaril_commander: The player clicking this tells the player with the card in their area their cards
ui.setup.title: TWILIGHT IMPERIUM
ui.setup.subtitle: 4th Edition
ui.setup.suggest_6p_skinny: Recommend “6P Skinny Table” for better player/viewer experience
ui.button.place_trade_goods_and_set_turn: Place Trade Goods and Set Turns
ui.button.end_status_phase: Return Strategy Cards and End Status Phase
ui.tab.map.fog.description:
Updated when changing turns, players see only systems where they have units or control planets, as well as adjacent systems.

Activating a system temporarily reveals that system (but not adjacent) to the activating player.
ui.phase.status.label: Status
ui.phase.agenda.label: Agenda
ui.draft.bunker_too_many_players: Bunker draft is only available for 6 or fewer players
ui.draft.bunker_offset: Shift home systems to right side
ui.draft.factions_from_cards:
Scan table for face-up faction cards, use those
and fill remaining slots with random factions
ui.draft.in_progress: Draft in progress, see player areas
ui.agenda.clippy.lock_no_whens_afters:
Lock-in no whens/afters
(Otherwise reset on play)
ui.agenda.clippy.playing_when_player_nam: {playerName} is playing a when, resetting no whens
ui.agenda.clippy.playing_after_player_na: {playerName} is playing an after, resetting no afters
ui.agenda.clippy.place_agenda_to_start: Place an agenda card on the “Agenda” spot to start.  Remove and replace the card to reset the agenda phase.
ui.agenda.clippy.would_you_like_help: It looks like you’re starting an Agenda phase. Would you like help?
ui.agenda.clippy.outcome_category: What kind of outcome is this?
ui.agenda.clippy.whens:
Starting with the speaker and continuing clockwise, play “WHEN an agenda is revealed”?

Click play for a WHEN, or No WHENs to pass.
ui.agenda.clippy.afters:
Starting with the speaker and continuing clockwise, play “AFTER an agenda is revealed”?

Click + for a rider, or No AFTERs to pass.
ui.agenda.clippy.voting:
Starting with the player left of the speaker and continuing clockwise, vote on the agenda.

Choose vote, then use +/- to vote.  Commit votes to move to next player.

Does not auto-skip in case other effects allow voting.
ui.agenda.clippy.vote_player_name: Choose an outcome {playerName}, then flip planets and/or use +/- to vote.
ui.agenda.clippy.pre: Any ”at the start of an agenda phase“ (Ancient Burial Sites)?
ui.agenda.clippy.post: Play any ”after the speaker votes“ (Bribery), then proceed.
unit_modifier.desc.aerie_sentinel: Does not count against capacity when with a ship with capacity
unit_modifier.desc.eidolon: Mech in space (not on a planet) count as ships
unit_modifier.desc.iconoclast: +2 mech COMBAT rolls if opponent has fragment
unit_modifier.desc.moll_terminus: Other's ground forces on planet cannot SUSTAIN DAMAGE
unit_modifier.desc.mordred: +2 mech COMBAT rolls if opponent has X/Y token
unit_modifier.desc.shield_paling: Infantry on planet with mech are not FRAGILE
unit_modifier.desc.arvicon_rex: +2 flagship COMBAT against opponent with no token in your fleet pool
unit_modifier.desc.cmorran_norr: +1 to all COMBAT rolls for other ships with the C'morran N'orr
unit_modifier.desc.fourth_moon: Opponent's ships cannot use SUSTAIN DAMAGE
unit_modifier.desc.matriarch: Fighters may participate in ground combat
unit_modifier.desc.quetzecoatl: Other players cannot use SPACE CANNON against your ships in this system
unit_modifier.desc.salai_sai_corian: Rolls number of dice equal to number of opponent's non-fighter ships
unit_modifier.desc.the_alastor: Ground forces may participate in space combat
unit_modifier.desc.visz_el_vir: Your mechs in this system roll 1 additional die during combat
unit_modifier.desc.2ram: PLANETARY SHIELD does not prevent BOMBARDMENT
unit_modifier.desc.brother_omar: Produce an additional Infantry for their cost; it doesn't count towards production limits.
unit_modifier.desc.conventions_of_war: Players cannot use BOMBARDMENT against units that are on cultural planets
unit_modifier.desc.disable: Opponent PDS lose PLANETARY SHIELD and SPACE CANNON DEFENSE
unit_modifier.desc.emissary_taivra: Active with-wormhole system is adjacent to other wormholes
unit_modifier.desc.evelyn_delouis: +1 die to a single GROUND COMBAT roll
unit_modifier.desc.experimental_battlest: One in or adjacent Space Dock gets SPACE CANNON 5x3
unit_modifier.desc.maban: Produce an additional Fighter for their cost; it doesn't count towards production limits.
unit_modifier.desc.munitions_reserves: Spend 2 TGs to reroll space combat misses
unit_modifier.desc.navarch_feng: You can produce your flagship without spending resources.
unit_modifier.desc.plasma_scoring: +1 die to a single SPACE CANNON or BOMBARDMENT roll
unit_modifier.desc.strike_wing_ambuscade: +1 die to a unit ability (anti-fighter barrage, bombardment, space cannon)
unit_modifier.desc.ta_zern: You may reroll any dice (when active will reroll all misses)
unit_modifier.desc.tachyon_lance_ii: SPACE CANNON of units in this system may target adjacent systems
unit_modifier.desc.tekklar_legion: +1 to GROUND COMBAT rolls for attacker, -1 to Sardakk if opponent owns
unit_modifier.desc.that_which_molds_fles: When producing Infantry and/or Fighters, up to 2 do not count against the production limit.
unit_modifier.desc.the_cavalry: One non-fighter ship gains the SUSTAIN DAMAGE, combat value, and ANTI-FIGHTER BARRAGE of the Nomad flagship (this modifier adds a new unit for AFB/space combat, remove the affected unit from normal setup)
unit_modifier.desc.the_crown_of_thalnos: Apply +1 to COMBAT rolls, reroll misses but must destroy any units that do not produce at least one hit
unit_modifier.desc.trrakan_aun_zulok: +1 die to a unit ability (anti-fighter barrage, bombardment, space cannon)
unit_modifier.desc.viscount_unlenn: +1 die to a single SPACE COMBAT roll

hide_cursor.cannot_hide_player_desk_slot: Cannot hide cursor for active player desk
streamer.desc.timestamp: Anonymized game data timestamp, if in use.  Click to select for copying.
streamer.desc.toggle_hide_cursor: Hide non-player cursor from everyone except the owning player.
streamer.desc.buddy: Send game data to “TI4 Streamer Buddy” application running on TTPG host's system.
franken.config: Choose how many of each type per draft box:
franken.prune: 1. Delete any draftable items you wish to ban
franken.fill_draft_boxes: 2. Fill draft containers from draftable items
franken.draft: 3. Draft items, passing containers to the next player
franken.gain_undraftables: 4. Allocate undraftable items from current choices
franken.finalize: 5. Choose final components to use as faction, delete others
franken.finish_draft: 6. Create factions from draft components on table
desc.card.action.plague: Place this card face-up anywhere on the table, then use the system tile menu to select plague
bogus.last.entry: reserved last entry so others can always end with a comma
